00027 namespace omega
00028 {
00030 class PQService: public InputService
00031 {
00032 public:
00033         // Allocator function
00034         static PQService* New() { return new PQService(); }
00035 
00036 public:
00037         OMEGA_API virtual void initialize();
00038         OMEGA_API virtual void dispose();
00039 
00040         OMEGA_API void setup(Setting& settings);
00041         OMEGA_API void initialize(  char* local_ip );
00042         OMEGA_API int init();

00044 private:
00045         static PQService* mysInstance;  
00046         static int maxBlobSize;
00047         const char* server_ip;
00048         int touchID[1000]; // Max IDs assigned before resetting
00049         static int maxTouches; // Should be same number as touchID array init
00050         int nextID;
00051 
00053         // onReceivePointFrame: function to handle when recieve touch point frame
00054         //      the unmoving touch point won't be sent from server. The new touch point with its pointevent is TP_DOWN
00055         //      and the leaving touch point with its pointevent will be always sent from server;
00056         static void onReceivePointFrame(int frame_id,int time_stamp,int moving_point_count,const TouchPoint * moving_point_array, void * call_back_object);
00057         // onReceivePointFrame: function to handle when recieve touch gesture
00058         static void onReceiveGesture(const TouchGesture & ges, void * call_back_object);
00059         // onServerBreak: function to handle when server break(disconnect or network error)
00060         static void onServerBreak(void * param, void * call_back_object);
00061         // onReceiveError: function to handle when some errors occur on the process of receiving touch datas.
00062         static void onReceiveError(int err_code,void * call_back_object);
00063         //
00064         static void OnGetServerResolution(int x, int y, void * call_back_object);
00066 
00067         // functions to handle TouchGestures, attention the means of the params
00068         void InitFuncOnTG();
00069         
00070         // set the call back functions while reciving touch data;
00071         void SetFuncsOnReceiveProc();
00072 
00073         // OnTouchPoint: function to handle TouchPoint
00074         void OnTouchPoint(const TouchPoint & tp);
00075         // OnTouchGesture: function to handle TouchGesture
00076         void OnTouchGesture(const TouchGesture & tg);
00077         //
00078 
00079         //here use function pointer table to handle the different gesture type;
00080         typedef void (*PFuncOnTouchGesture)(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object);
00081         PFuncOnTouchGesture m_pf_on_tges[TG_TOUCH_END + 1];
00082         static void DefaultOnTG(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object); // just show the gesture
00083         static void OnTG_TouchStart(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object);

00087         static void OnTG_SecondDown(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object);
00088         static void OnTG_SecondUp(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object);
00089         static void OnTG_SplitStart(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object);
00090         static void OnTG_SplitApart(const TouchGesture & tg,void * call_object);
